steps.title: Step Three
steps.description1: Use a marker to draw on a face
steps.description2: Use some glue to stick the leaves on the back of your stick for fairy wings

steps.title: Step Four
steps.description1: Add more leaves to make some clothes
steps.description2: Use your extras to give your fairy a little hat

steps.title: Step Three
steps.description1: Use your fingers to cover your cardboard in mud
steps.description2: Press your leaves into the mud

steps.title: Step Four
steps.description1: Press your flowers into the mud
steps.description2: Press any of your extras in to finish

steps.title: Step Three
steps.description1: Wash your rock off so it's nice and clean
steps.description2: Use your paintbrush to cover the entire rock

steps.title: Step Four
steps.description1: Paint two eyes onto your rock
steps.description2: Add a nose and a smile!

steps.title: Step Three
steps.description1: Apply paint to your leaves with your fingers or a paintbrush
steps.description2: Flip leaf over, paintside down and press into the paper

steps.title: Step Four
steps.description1: Apply paint to your flowers, or extras
steps.description2: Press paint side down onto your paper

steps.title: Step Three
steps.description1: Have a grownup cut two squares of contact paper, and peel the back off
steps.description2: Arrange all of your nature peices on the sticky side

steps.title: Step Four
steps.description1: Place the other piece of contact paper on top so the sticky sides touch
steps.description2: Glue your popcicle sticks around the edges to make a frame. Add some string at the top

steps.title: Step Three
steps.description1: Have a grown up measure your head and cut your paper bag to fit
steps.description2: Use your markers and/or paint to decorate the paper bag

steps.title: Step Four
steps.description1: Use your glue to attach your nature pieces onto the paper bag
steps.description2: Once dry, glue the backs together to form your crown!
